text: Maa dahi dangada gaa hai hua igolo bolo ia e helekai hua kokohp, dono damana mo dono dinana donu ga hagi anga gi mee bolo mee e hai loo gi daaligi gii made, idimaa mee guu hai bolo ia e helekai nia helekai Dimaadua, gei mee ne helekai tilikai. Di madagoaa a mee ma ga helekai kokohp, dono damana mo dono dinana donu ga daalo a mee gii made.
